    • createSimulatorParams

      public static Params createSimulatorParams(Context context, TreeMap<ZonedDateTime,Period> existingSchedule) throws InvalidValueException
      Create Params for Simulator.
      Parameters:
      context - the Context object
      existingSchedule - the existing Schedule, i.e. result of previous optimization
      Returns:
      Params
      Throws:
      InvalidValueException - on error

    • joinConsumptionPredictions

      protected static Integer[] joinConsumptionPredictions(int splitAfterIndex, Integer[] totalConsumption, Integer[] unmanagedConsumption)

    • toEnergy

      protected static int toEnergy(int power)

    • interpolateArray

      protected static float[] interpolateArray(Float[] values)
      Interpolate an Array of Floats.

      Replaces nulls with previous value. If first entry is null, it is set to first available value. If all values are null, all are set to 0.

      Parameters:
      values - the values
      Returns:
      values without nulls

    • interpolateArray

      protected static int[] interpolateArray(Integer[] values)
      Interpolate an Array of Integers.

      Replaces nulls with previous value. If first entry is null, it is set to first available value. If all values are null, all are set to 0.

      Parameters:
      values - the values
      Returns:
      values without nulls

    • calculateStateChargeEnergy

      protected static int calculateStateChargeEnergy(int maxBuyFromGrid, int consumption, int production, int essMaxCharge)
      Calculates the ESS charge energy for one period in StateMachine.CHARGE state.
      Parameters:
      maxBuyFromGrid - Max Buy-From-Grid Energy per Period [Wh]
      consumption - Consumption prediction
      production - Production prediction
      essMaxCharge - the max ESS charge energy after constraints; always negative
      Returns:
      ESS charge energy

    • calculateCharge100

      public static Integer calculateCharge100(ManagedSymmetricEss ess, Sum sum, int maxChargePowerFromGrid)
      Calculates the ActivePower constraint for CHARGE state.
      Parameters:
      ess - the ManagedSymmetricEss
      sum - the Sum
      maxChargePowerFromGrid - the configured max charge from grid power
      Returns:
      the set-point or null

    • handleGetScheduleRequest

      public static GetScheduleResponse handleGetScheduleRequest(Optimizer optimizer, UUID requestId, SortedMap<ZonedDateTime,SortedMap<ChannelAddress,com.google.gson.JsonElement>> queryResult, ChannelAddress channelPrices, ChannelAddress channelStateMachine) throws OpenemsException
      Utilizes the previous three hours' data and computes the next 21 hours data from the Optimizer provided, then concatenates them to generate a 24-hour GetScheduleResponse.
      Parameters:
      optimizer - the Optimizer
      requestId - the JSON-RPC request-id
      queryResult - the historic data.
      channelPrices - the ChannelAddress for Quarterly prices.
      channelStateMachine - the ChannelAddress for the state machine.
      Returns:
      the GetScheduleResponse
      Throws:
      OpenemsException - on error

    • postprocessPeriodState

      public static StateMachine postprocessPeriodState(Params p, int essInitial, int gridEssCharge, float price, int balancingChargeDischarge, StateMachine state)
      Post-Process a state of a Period, i.e. replace with 'better' state with the same behaviour.

      NOTE: heavy computation is ok here, because this method is called only at the end with the best Schedule.

      Parameters:
      p - the Params
      essInitial - the initial ESS energy in this period
      gridEssCharge - grid-buy energy that is used to charge the ESS
      price - the price in this period
      balancingChargeDischarge - the ESS energy that would be required for BALANCING
      state - the initial state
      Returns:
      the new state

    • buildInitialPopulation

      public static List<io.jenetics.Genotype<io.jenetics.IntegerGene>> buildInitialPopulation(Params p)
      Gets the current existingSchedule (i.e. the bestGenotype of last optimization run) as Genotype to serve as initial population.
      Parameters:
      p - the Params
      Returns:
      the Genotype
